createPrediction(address,string,uint8,ui.details: Can optionally seed the pool with initial liquidity (split evenly across options)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

placeBet(uint256,uint8).details: Bots cannot bet on themselves in BOT_ROI predictionsUsers can add to their existing bet on the same option

params._optionId: Corresponding option ID in BOT_ROI predictions

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._optionId: The option to add liquidity to (0 = split evenly)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

canBotBetOnOption(address,uint256,uint8).notice: Check if bot can bet on specific option (self-bet restriction)

getBotOptionId(address).notice: Get bot's option ID for BOT_ROI predictions

isBot(address).notice: Check if address is a registered bot

placeBet(uint256,uint8).notice: Place a bet on a prediction (or add to existing bet)

resolvePrediction(uint256,uint8,bool,uin.notice: Resolve a prediction with tie support

seedPrediction(uint256,uint8).notice: Seed a prediction pool with liquidity (owner only)
